profile:
Pavestar is a full service asphalt and interlocking company with a track record of over 40 years of quality workmanship in the residential and commercial market. At Pavestar, we take great pride in the outstanding reputation we have earned from providing a professional and reliable service, at a fair price.

You can be sure that as one of Ontario's premier paving companies, our fully trained staff will utilize their expertise, hand in hand with the highest quality material available, resulting in the best experience possible for our customers.

Pavestar custom tailors the paving project according to the look and feel of your property.   As a pioneer in the paving industry, we are experts in turning your patio, walkway, courtyard, pool surround, driveway or entrance, into a valuable asset to your home and the envy of you

SERVICING - GTA, Toronto, Markham, Vaughan, Aurora, King City, Scarborough, Mississauga,  Richmond Hill, Pickering, Brampton, Oakville, Bolton, Barrie
